game.name: Settler's Domain
game.shortDescription: Settler's Domain is a settlement-building game with citizen and resource management elements. Build structures, recruit settlers, gather resources, and uncover your surroundings to expand your domain.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Settler's Domain is a settlement-building game with citizen and resource management elements. Build structures, recruit settlers, gather resources, and uncover your surroundings to expand your domain.
